presentationColumns.name: Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity net of cancelled quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Ordered Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Original Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity including cancelled quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Original Ordered Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of cancelled quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Cancelled Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Consignment Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of consigned quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Consignment Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of billed quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Billed Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as  sum of delivered quantity at distribution level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Delivered Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Received Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as  sum of received quantity at schedule level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Received Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of shipped quantity at schedule level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Shipped Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Accepted Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of accepted quantity at schedule level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Accepted Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of rejected quantity at schedule level in primary UOM
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Rejected Quantity (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Over Receipt Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows quantity that is received more than purchase order quantity in primary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Over Receipt Quantity (Primary UOM)
